message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.CG (Computational Geometry) is the most likely category as the paper deals with geometric objects and their approximation using piecewise linear functions. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper discusses algorithms for solving max-$\star$ equations and convex regression problems. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is relevant as the paper mentions applications to machine learning. 
- cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) is relevant as the paper discusses optimization and solving equations. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is less likely but still possible as the paper mentions applications to optimization and control.
